mapper.select: select a.doc_nm, a.doc_url, a.isu_cd, a.acpt_no, a.rpt_nm, a.tns_dt, a.submit_nm, a.temp_rpt_nm, (select isu_nm from isu where isu_cd = a.isu_cd) as isu_nm, a.code_type from kongsiholder a where a.doc_no = #{doc_no} and a.isu_cd = #{isu_cd} and a.acpt_no = #{acpt_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stockholder (isu_cd, doc_no, owner_name, change_date, before_amt, after_amt, change_amt, unit_price, birth_day, acpt_no, unit_price2, stock_method, stock_type, acpt_dt,etc,etc2,birth_ym,is_compressed,odd_value_yn,before_price,prnt_seq) VALUES (#{isu_cd}, #{doc_no}, #{owner_name}, #{change_date}, #{before_amt}, #{after_amt}, #{change_amt}, #{unit_price}, #{birth_day}, #{acpt_no}, #{unit_price2}, #{stock_method}, #{stock_type}, #{acpt_dt},#{etc},#{etc2},#{birth_ym},#{is_compressed},#{odd_value_yn},#{before_price},#{prnt_seq})

INSERT INTO staffholder (kongsi_day, name, gender, birth_day, spot, regi_officer_yn, full_time_yn, responsibilities, major_career, voting_stock, no_voting_stock, service_duration, expiration_date, isu_cd, doc_no, doc_url, acpt_no,birth_ym) VALUES (#{kongsi_day}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth_day}, #{spot}, #{regi_officer_yn}, #{full_time_yn}, #{responsibilities}, #{major_career}, #{voting_stock}, #{no_voting_stock}, #{service_duration}, #{expiration_date}, #{isu_cd}, #{doc_no}, #{doc_url}, #{acpt_no},#{birth_ym})
INSERT INTO accessholder (id, type, regdate, param1, param2,ip) VALUES (#{id}, #{type}, #{regdate}, #{param1}, #{param2},#{ip})
INSERT INTO purposeholder (isu_cd, open_date, type, purpose, reason, doc_url) VALUES (#{isu_cd}, #{open_date}, #{type}, #{purpose}, #{reason}, #{doc_url})
INSERT INTO purposeholder (isu_cd, open_date, type, reason, doc_url, before_purp, after_purp) VALUES (#{isu_cd}, #{open_date}, #{type}, #{reason}, #{doc_url}, #{before_purp}, #{after_purp})
INSERT INTO errorholder (from_queue, body, error) VALUES (#{from_queue}, #{body}, #{error})
mapper.select: select a.userid, ifnull(b.keyword, '') as keyword, ifnull(a.grade, 10) as grade, ifnull(c.chat_id, 0) as chat_id, ifnull(c.bot_seq, -1) as bot_seq from member a left join keywordholder b on a.userid = b.userid and b.useYn = 'Y' left join telegram c on a.userid = c.userid and c.userYn = 'Y' where chat_id not in (0)

select a.userid, ifnull(b.keyword, '') as keyword, ifnull(b.order, 10) as _order from member a left join keywordholder b on a.userid = b.userid and b.useYn = 'Y' where b.keyword is not null order by _order
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rumorholder (isu_cd, doc_no, acpt_no, type, kongsi_dt, contents, title, kongsi_due_dt, media, skip_count, kongsi_res_dt) VALUES (#{isu_cd}, #{doc_no}, #{acpt_no}, #{type}, #{kongsi_dt}, #{contents}, #{title}, #{kongsi_due_dt}, #{media}, #{skip_count}, #{kongsi_res_dt})
INSERT INTO telegramholder (doc_no, keyword, isu_cd, acpt_no, created_at, processed_yn) VALUES (#{doc_no}, #{keyword}, #{isu_cd}, #{acpt_no}, now(), 'N')
mapper.select: select a.doc_no, a.keyword, a.isu_cd, a.acpt_no, a.created_at, b.doc_nm, b.doc_url, b.rpt_nm, b.tns_dt from telegramholder a, kongsiholder b where a.doc_no = b.doc_no and a.isu_cd = b.isu_cd and a.acpt_no = b.acpt_no and a.processed_yn = 'N' order by b.tns_dt limit 30
select a.userid, ifnull(b.isu_cd, '') as isu_cd from member a left join member_code b on a.userid = b.userid and b.use_yn = 'Y'

select a.doc_no, a.keyword, a.isu_cd, a.acpt_no, a.created_at, b.doc_nm, b.doc_url, b.rpt_nm, b.tns_dt from telegramholder a, kongsiholder b where a.doc_no = b.doc_no and a.isu_cd = b.isu_cd and a.acpt_no = b.acpt_no and a.group_processed_yn = 'N' order by b.tns_dt limit 9
select a.seq, a.name, a.token from telegrambot a where use_yn = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expirationholder (name, birthday, isu_cd, changeday, doc_no, acpt_no, doc_url) VALUES (#{name}, #{birthday}, #{isu_cd}, #{changeday}, #{doc_no}, #{acpt_no}, #{doc_url})
INSERT INTO rsspubholder (pub_date) VALUES (#{pub_date})

INSERT INTO largeststockholder (name, birthday, isu_cd, changedate, gender, homeabroad, relation, doubleup1, doubleup2, generalstockcnt, generalratio, kindstockcnt, kindratio, stockdepositorycnt, stockdepositoryratio, firststockratio, doc_no, acpt_no, firststockcnt, nationality) VALUES (#{name}, #{birthday}, #{isu_cd}, #{changedate}, #{gender}, #{homeabroad}, #{relation}, #{doubleup1}, #{doubleup2}, #{generalstockcnt}, #{generalratio}, #{kindstockcnt}, #{kindratio}, #{stockdepositorycnt}, #{stockdepositoryratio}, #{firststockratio}, #{doc_no}, #{acpt_no}, #{firststockcnt}, #{nationality})

INSERT INTO relativeholder (name, birth, isu_cd, gender, homeabroad, nationality, relation_him, address, job, relation_com, doc_no, acpt_no, change_date, new_yn) VALUES (#{name}, #{birth}, #{isu_cd}, #{gender}, #{homeabroad}, #{nationality}, #{relation_him}, #{address}, #{job}, #{relation_com}, #{doc_no}, #{acpt_no}, #{change_date}, #{new_yn})
mapper.select: select a.name, a.birth, a.gender, a.homeabroad, a.nationality, a.relation_him, a.address, a.job, a.relation_com from relativeholder a, telegramholder b where a.doc_no = b.doc_no and a.isu_cd = b.isu_cd and a.acpt_no = b.acpt_no and a.doc_no = #{doc_no} and a.isu_cd = #{isu_cd} and a.acpt_no = #{acpt_no} and b.keyword = 'RELATIVE'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO krrsspubholder (pub_date) VALUES (#{pub_date})
INSERT INTO staffholder (kongsi_day, name, birth_day, spot, isu_cd, doc_no, acpt_no, doc_url) VALUES (#{kongsi_day}, #{name}, #{birth_day}, #{spot}, #{isu_cd}, #{doc_no}, #{acpt_no}, #{doc_url})

INSERT INTO perfholder (seq, dang_mae_dang, dang_mae_nu, dang_yeong_dang, dang_yeong_nu, dang_beob_dang, dang_beob_nu, dang_dang_dang, dang_dang_nu, dang_ji_dang, dang_ji_nu, sil_mae_dang, sil_mae_nu, sil_yeong_dang, sil_yeong_nu, sil_beob_dang, sil_beob_nu, sil_dang_dang, sil_dang_nu, sil_ji_dang, sil_ji_nu, yul_mae_dang, yul_mae_nu, yul_yeong_dang, yul_yeong_nu, yul_beob_dang, yul_beob_nu, yul_dang_dang, yul_dang_nu, yul_ji_dang, yul_ji_nu, jeon_sil_mae_dang, jeon_sil_mae_nu, jeon_sil_yeong_dang, jeon_sil_yeong_nu, jeon_sil_beob_dang, jeon_sil_beob_nu, jeon_sil_dang_dang, jeon_sil_dang_nu, jeon_sil_ji_dang, jeon_sil_ji_nu, jeon_jeung_mae_dang, jeon_jeung_mae_nu, jeon_jeung_yeong_dang, jeon_jeung_yeong_nu, jeon_jeung_beob_dang, jeon_jeung_beob_nu, jeon_jeung_dang_dang, jeon_jeung_dang_nu, jeon_jeung_ji_dang, jeon_jeung_ji_nu, unit1, unit2, provider, subject, provider_date, provider_positon, contact, isu_cd, doc_no, acpt_no, acpt_dt,quarter,quarter_tp,year) VALUES (#{seq},#{dang_mae_dang},#{dang_mae_nu},#{dang_yeong_dang},#{dang_yeong_nu},#{dang_beob_dang},#{dang_beob_nu},#{dang_dang_dang},#{dang_dang_nu},#{dang_ji_dang},#{dang_ji_nu},#{sil_mae_dang},#{sil_mae_nu},#{sil_yeong_dang},#{sil_yeong_nu},#{sil_beob_dang},#{sil_beob_nu},#{sil_dang_dang},#{sil_dang_nu},#{sil_ji_dang},#{sil_ji_nu},#{yul_mae_dang},#{yul_mae_nu},#{yul_yeong_dang},#{yul_yeong_nu},#{yul_beob_dang},#{yul_beob_nu},#{yul_dang_dang},#{yul_dang_nu},#{yul_ji_dang},#{yul_ji_nu},#{jeon_sil_mae_dang},#{jeon_sil_mae_nu},#{jeon_sil_yeong_dang},#{jeon_sil_yeong_nu},#{jeon_sil_beob_dang},#{jeon_sil_beob_nu},#{jeon_sil_dang_dang},#{jeon_sil_dang_nu},#{jeon_sil_ji_dang},#{jeon_sil_ji_nu},#{jeon_jeung_mae_dang},#{jeon_jeung_mae_nu},#{jeon_jeung_yeong_dang},#{jeon_jeung_yeong_nu},#{jeon_jeung_beob_dang},#{jeon_jeung_beob_nu},#{jeon_jeung_dang_dang},#{jeon_jeung_dang_nu},#{jeon_jeung_ji_dang},#{jeon_jeung_ji_nu},#{unit1},#{unit2},#{provider},#{subject},#{provider_date},#{provider_positon},#{contact},#{isu_cd},#{doc_no},#{acpt_no},#{acpt_dt},#{quarter},#{quarter_tp},#{year})
INSERT INTO stockdupholder (isu_cd, doc_no, acpt_no, doc_url, stock_seq) VALUES (#{isu_cd}, #{doc_no}, #{acpt_no}, #{doc_url}, #{stock_seq})
INSERT INTO trotholder (isu_cd, doc_no, acpt_no, isu_nm, keyword,sigan,date_sigan) VALUES (#{isu_cd}, #{doc_no}, #{acpt_no}, #{isu_nm}, #{keyword},#{sigan},#{date_sigan})

INSERT INTO kongsiholder (isu_cd,doc_no, doc_nm, doc_url, doc_type, tns_dt, acpt_no, rpt_nm,acpt_dt,submit_nm,temp_rpt_nm,code_type) VALUES ( #{isu_cd},#{doc_no}, #{doc_nm}, #{doc_url}, #{doc_type}, #{tns_dt}, #{acpt_no}, #{rpt_nm},#{acpt_dt},#{submit_nm},#{temp_rpt_nm},#{code_type});
mapper.select: select count(*) from kongsiholder where isu_cd = #{isu_cd} and doc_no = #{doc_no} and acpt_no=#{acpt_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO takingholder (acpt_dt,name, birth, owner_capital, borrowings, etc, sum,resource,borrower,borrow_amount,borrow_period,collateral,doc_no,isu_cd,acpt_no,type,err_msg,spot) VALUES ( #{acpt_dt},#{name}, #{birth}, #{owner_capital}, #{borrowings}, #{etc}, #{sum}, #{resource},#{borrower},#{borrow_amount},#{borrow_period},#{collateral},#{doc_no},#{isu_cd},#{acpt_no},#{type},#{err_msg},#{spot})

INSERT INTO givetakeholder (isu_cd, change_date, name, change_amount, give_take_type, birth, price, price2, before_amount, after_amount, stock_type, etc, target, target_type,doc_no,acpt_no,stock_method,acpt_dt,gender,nationality,relation) VALUES (#{isu_cd}, #{change_date}, #{name}, #{change_amount}, #{give_take_type}, #{birth}, #{price}, #{price2}, #{before_amount}, #{after_amount}, #{stock_type}, #{etc}, #{target}, #{target_type},#{doc_no},#{acpt_no},#{stock_method},#{acpt_dt},#{gender},#{nationality},#{relation})

INSERT INTO mystockholder (doc_no,isu_cd,acpt_no,acpt_dt,company,stock_count_gen,stock_count_etc,stock_amount_gen,stock_amount_etc,start_period,end_period,start_period2,end_period2,purpose,method,dispose_method1,dispose_method2,dispose_method3,dispose_method4,before_my_gen_count,before_my_gen_ratio,before_my_etc_count,before_my_etc_ratio,before_etc_gen_count,before_etc_gen_ratio,before_etc_etc_count,before_etc_etc_ratio,decision_date,agency,target_stock_gen_price,target_stock_etc_price,type) VALUES (#{doc_no},#{isu_cd},#{acpt_no},#{acpt_dt},#{company},#{stock_count_gen},#{stock_count_etc},#{stock_amount_gen},#{stock_amount_etc},#{start_period},#{end_period},#{start_period2},#{end_period2},#{purpose},#{method},#{dispose_method1},#{dispose_method2},#{dispose_method3},#{dispose_method4},#{before_my_gen_count},#{before_my_gen_ratio},#{before_my_etc_count},#{before_my_etc_ratio},#{before_etc_gen_count},#{before_etc_gen_ratio},#{before_etc_etc_count},#{before_etc_etc_ratio},#{decision_date},#{agency},#{target_stock_gen_price},#{target_stock_etc_price},#{type})

INSERT INTO contractholder (action_type,contract_gubun,contract_name,contents1,contents2,contents3,contents4,contents5,contents6,contents7,target,relation_with_company,sales_area,contract_start_date,contract_end_date,contract_condition,termination_reason,do_date,reservation_reason,reservation_period,etc,doc_no,isu_cd,acpt_no,acpt_dt,contract_date) VALUES (#{action_type},#{contract_gubun},#{contract_name},#{contents1},#{contents2},#{contents3},#{contents4},#{contents5},#{contents6},#{contents7},#{target},#{relation_with_company},#{sales_area},#{contract_start_date},#{contract_end_date},#{contract_condition},#{termination_reason},#{do_date},#{reservation_reason},#{reservation_period},#{etc},#{doc_no},#{isu_cd},#{acpt_no},#{acpt_dt},#{contract_date})
mapper.select: select a.before_amt, a.after_amt, a.seq, a.change_date from stockholder a, (select doc_no, isu_cd, acpt_no, owner_name, change_date from stockholder where isu_cd = #{isu_cd} and owner_name = #{owner_name} and change_date < #{change_date} order by change_date desc limit 1) b where a.doc_no = b.doc_no and a.isu_cd = b.isu_cd and a.acpt_no = b.acpt_no and a.owner_name = b.owner_name and a.change_date = b.change_date order by a.after_amt limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO touchholder (financial_type,now_revenue,before_revenue,revenue_amount,revenue_ratio,now_profit,before_profit,profi_amount,profit_ratio,now_ordi_profit,before_ordi_profit,ordi_profit_amount,ordi_profit_ratio,now_income,before_income,income_amount,income_ratio,is_large_corp,now_total_assets,before_total_assets,now_total_debt,before_total_debt,now_total_cap,before_total_cap,now_cap,before_cap,now_asscap_ratio,before_asscap_ratio,sales_variation_cause,etc, doc_no, isu_cd, acpt_no, acpt_dt) VALUES (#{financial_type},#{now_revenue},#{before_revenue},#{revenue_amount},#{revenue_ratio},#{now_profit},#{before_profit},#{profi_amount},#{profit_ratio},#{now_ordi_profit},#{before_ordi_profit},#{ordi_profit_amount},#{ordi_profit_ratio},#{now_income},#{before_income},#{income_amount},#{income_ratio},#{is_large_corp},#{now_total_assets},#{before_total_assets},#{now_total_debt},#{before_total_debt},#{now_total_cap},#{before_total_cap},#{now_cap},#{before_cap},#{now_asscap_ratio},#{before_asscap_ratio},#{sales_variation_cause},#{etc}, #{doc_no}, #{isu_cd}, #{acpt_no}, #{acpt_dt})

INSERT INTO trialsholder (doc_no,isu_cd,acpt_no,type,title,purpose,approval_agency,approval_date,approval_history,future_plan,confirm_date,etc,acpt_dt) VALUES (#{doc_no},#{isu_cd},#{acpt_no},#{type},#{title},#{purpose},#{approval_agency},#{approval_date},#{approval_history},#{future_plan},#{confirm_date},#{etc},#{acpt_dt})
mapper.select: select seq,name,birth_day,spot,responsibilities as task from staffholder where doc_no = #{doc_no} and isu_cd = #{isu_cd} and acpt_no = #{acpt_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO birth (kongsi_birth,parsed_birth,open_birth,nm,doc_no,isu_cd,acpt_no,doc_url,acpt_year) VALUES (#{kongsi_birth},#{parsed_birth},#{open_birth},#{nm},#{doc_no},#{isu_cd},#{acpt_no},#{doc_url},#{acpt_year})
mapper.select: select /* SharedRepository.findRepresentativeName */ name,rep_nm from repnmholder
select prnt_seq from tachyon.child_fund where birth = #{birth} order by seq limit 1
select seq from parent_fund where birth = #{birth}
mapper.insert:
INSERT /* GoogleMapper.insertParentFund */ INTO parent_fund ( hname, ename, address, birth, job, bc_company, bc_name, bc_spot, doc_no, isu_cd, acpt_no
) VALUES ( #{hname}, #{ename}, #{address}, #{birth}, #{job}, #{bc_company}, #{bc_name}, #{bc_spot}, #{doc_no}, #{isu_cd}, #{acpt_no} )

INSERT /* TemplateMapper.insertChildFund */ INTO child_fund ( prnt_seq, ename, type, relation, birth, nationality, address, job, etc ) VALUES ( #{prnt_seq}, #{ename}, #{type}, #{relation}, #{birth}, #{nationality}, #{address}, #{job}, #{etc} )
mapper.select: select count(seq) from child_fund where prnt_seq = #{prnt_seq} and birth = #{birth}
